verses.name: 1 Kings 22:20
verses.text: And the Lord said, Who shall persuade Ahab, that he may go up and fall at Ramoth–gilead? And one said on this manner, and another said on that manner.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:21
verses.text: And there came forth a spirit, and stood before the Lord, and said, I will persuade him.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:22
verses.text: And the Lord said unto him, Wherewith? And he said, I will go forth, and I will be a lying spirit in the mouth of all his prophets. And he said, Thou shalt persuade him, and prevail also: go forth, and do so.
